domain.name: Politician
domain.description: Politicians in the world, like Joe Biden

text:
@realDonaldTrump After a historic week of tanking, Tiny. You were quiet as a churchmouse when we were all losing 30% of our portfolios due to your bungling of the coronavirus crisis, yet now—true to form—you reappear to gloat about a good day, even though it’s still down 20+%. 
#jackass
